channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Then green arrow below the green light never comes on so not safe to turn right as oncoming traffic, 26th June
item.description:
The traffc lights when leaving the a4019 to turn right onto swindon road right by the post office depot
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Poole Way, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: Damaged road sign for over 6 months, 26th June
item.description:
Exactly where I dropped the pin on the roundabout
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign structurally damaged/leaning more than 20 degrees/loose in ground (Non illuminating sign)

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 26th June
item.description:
28 day with give and take carriageway pothole on pedestrian crossing point so footway criteria used 1400x850x30mm plus x11 NSD tarmac patch required (CW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 26th June
item.description:
28 day with give and take plus temporary footway closure footway abrupt level lift and replace x 1 900x600x20mm slab with tarmac patch number 7 (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)
Report on FixMyStreet
